alert.note: Alert for Perry (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 17 at 9:14AM EDT until June 17 at 10:00AM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Louisville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Perry County in south central Indiana... Hancock County in central Kentucky... Western Breckinridge County in central Kentucky... Northeastern Ohio County in central Kentucky... * Until 900 AM CDT. * At 813 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Santa Claus to near St. Joseph, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * These severe thunderstorms will remain over mainly rural areas of southern Perry, Hancock, western Breckinridge and northeastern Ohio Counties, including the following locations... Frymire, Skillman, Goering, Ralph, Gerald, Tar Fork, Rome, Vanzant, Ellmitch and Arrington Corner. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
